title: Ep. 57 - Monkey Business
description:
On today's show, the guys discuss whether or not having a pet monkey/orangutan is a good idea and what some of the benefits would be. They also discuss their respective dogs and how it feels similar to being a parent, and Gorman tells the legend of his former dog, Norman Gorman. The guys also discuss Pat's name climbing back up the odds ladder for the Monday Night Football job (#McAfeeForMNF), a man scamming Facebook and Google for over 120 million dollars, Cardi B being in hot water for some comments she made about the way she treated patrons of her former strip club, The Pub boys starting their own scooter gang, and Nick, Ty, and Digs starting a Jeep gang. Pat also retells the hilarious story about Laron Landry's pet monkey, and Edgerrin James deciding that he didn't want to go to Tokyo for a preseason NFL game, plus much more. It's a fun one, come and have a good time with us.


This episode features @toddmccomas, @PatMcAfeeShow, @Digz, @nickmaraldo, @tyschmit, @BostonConnr, @HeyGorman, @VivalaZito, and @evanfoxy and closes with a timeless classic from Hootie and the Blowfish.
dc:creator: The Pod
